titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on 4-methoxy-2-methyldiphenylamine.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/23/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to grant temporarily duty-free treatment of 4-methoxy-2-methyldiphenylamine.
